game.title: Retrieve the Lost Scroll
game.objective: Reward the village elder with a rare scroll from a long-abandoned ruin.
game.description: The village elder has asked for your assistance in retrieving an ancient scroll that is said to be hidden within the ruins of a nearby castle. The scroll contains powerful knowledge and will bring great wisdom to the village.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the castle ruin
task.description: The ancient castle lies in ruins, and the entrance is hidden behind a waterfall. You must navigate through the dense forest and find the waterfall.

task.objective: Ride through the entrance and into the castle ruin
task.description: The entrance is behind a large boulder, hidden by foliage. You must push the boulder to reveal the entrance.
The scroll is located in a chamber deep within the castle. You must navigate through treacherous traps and puzzles to reach it.

task.objective: Return the scroll to the village elder
task.description: The village elder awaits your return with the scroll. You must bring it back to them in person.
